EditText.android:text: GOAL: The goal of your cool down is to give your body adequate time to transition from a state of high-stress from fast motion to a state of much less intensity\n\nApproximate duartion: 10-15 minutes

Can include:
- a lower intesity version of the same activity that your workout consisted of

Should include:
- low-intensity walking/jogging for up to 5 minutes
- light stretching
